all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
And the bow shall be in the cloud; and I will look upon it, that I may remember the everlasting covenant between God and every living creature of all flesh that is upon the earth.
Genesis 9:16
Quote of the Day
"We demonstrate our discipleship and love for God when we make Him our top priority."
Elder Steven C. Barlow | 1 Oct 2025General Conference
